item.description:
Facebook Event Link: http://www.facebook.com/events/406798482693807/

Due to the popular response, we've scheduled Tea Dances through the rest of the year. This Event is designed to bring GLBT Folks, Friends and Allies together for dancing, fellowship, socializing and more. DJ Dawn will spin the tunes, our kitchen will be open with a special Tea Dance menu. Our full bar will provide alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages. The dance floor will be open, Join us for dancing, laughing, games and more.
Proper ID Required 21+, $7 Cover charge

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Kick off the Summer - Tea Dance for all
